short_summary: Remediation project of G-Jetty and Jetty-11 in Esquimalt Harbour. Dredging and material placement for risk reduction.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) is implementing a remediation program in Esquimalt Harbour at G-Jetty and Jetty-11 to address contaminated sediments from historical industrial activities.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: G-Jetty and Jetty-11 Remediation**
=====================================

**Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the remediation of G-Jetty and Jetty-11 in Esquimalt Harbour.

**Project Description**
The DND is implementing a remediation program to address sediments contaminated by historical industrial activities. This project involves dredging and material placement measures to reduce ecological risk and associated liability.

**Key Dates**

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3698149314
* **Publication Date:** October 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 3, 2022, 2:00 pm PDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 30, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2023

**Contract Details**

* **Reference Number:** WS3698149314-Doc3700104520
* **Amendment Number:** 0
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Ken Ngan (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: None
	+ Fax: None

**Notice URL**
The complete tender notice can be accessed at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14308558?extsite=MTQzMDg1NThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Important:** Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 3, 2022, at 2:00 pm PDT. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Procurement Method**
This tender follows a competitive-selective tendering process, where the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will determine the successful contractor. The contracts are subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and other relevant trade agreements.
